title: Frank Ocean Releases New Song DHL: [LISTEN]
text:
Photo: Frank Ocean/via Pitchfork

Frank Ocean has made headlines this week for reasons entirely unrelated to his music, but we can put all that strangeness behind us now, because we finally have a new song from him, “DHL.” Ocean premiered the song during a broadcast of his Beats 1 radio show, “blonded RADIO,” along with previews of upcoming singles, “Dear April” and “Cayendo.” Twitter, predictably, exploded at news of the song, and fans are already overanalyzing the lyrics over at Genius. Listen to the song below, let it wash over you, and forget about not getting invited to PrEP+ and not being able to afford that $60 shirt.
description: Frank Ocean debuted his new single DHL on his Beats 1 radio show, blonded RADIO, called “DHL” along with previews of two other songs.
